Today in Donegal, it's a bit rough with fresh SSE winds at 24 mph and a consistent 6 ft @ 8s WSW swell, making it blown out. Tomorrow sees a slight increase in swell to 7 ft @ 8s W, but the wind remains fresh at 21 mph S, keeping conditions poor. By the day after, conditions improve significantly with 8 ft @ 11s NW swell and light ESE winds at 5 mph, offering clean and fun surf. Best: day after.
